title: Donu Donu Donu Lyrics Maari Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Don’u Don’u Don’u (The Don’s Romance)
Singer(s): Anirudh Ravichander & Alisha Thomas

Don’u Don’u Don’u 
naan unnoda gold meenu
sceneusceneusceneu
ne thottadhellaam sceneu
maanu maanu maanu
naan unnoda caffeine-u
gone-u gone-u gone-u
nee paarhthaale
naan gone-u.

Gundaana kannala
kuththaama kutthaadha
nee unna thandhaalum
paththaadhadi.

Rojapu dhegaththaal
raja naan saanjitten
un munne en geththu
nikkaadhadi.

urugudhey
undhan aanmai paarthu
mayangudhey
indha paavai thaan.

thavikkudhey 
ellai thaandi paarkka
thadukkudhey
pen naanam thaan.

urugudhey ..
mayangudhey ..
thavikkudhey ..
thadukkudhey
pen naanam thaan.

am a loyal husband
giving u a royal treatment
and your daily shopping
is graunteed.

your're my meesai maama
am your naughty maami
giving yo a life time 
service waranty.

ye vaama twinkle-u
come and mingleu
namma kaattula
naanthaan kingu

modern manmadhaa
aasa konduthaan
kanna thottuthaa
give me ring-u

naan sokkurendi
vikkurendi, oththayila
nikkurendi.

naan thiththikkavaa
paththikkavaa
othaikoththa aada ready.

urugudhey ..
mayangudhey ..
thavikkudhey..
thadukkudhey
pen naanam thaan.

urugudhey undhan
aanmai paarthu
mayangudhey
indha paavai thaan.

thavikkudhey 
ellai thaandi paarkka
thadukkudhey
pen naanam thaan.

Don’u Don’u Don’u 
naan unnoda gold meenu
sceneu sceneu sceneu
ne thottadhellaam scenu
maanu maanu maanu
naan unnoda caffeine-u
gone-u gone-u gone-u

Gundaana kannala
kuththaama kutthaadha
nee unna thandhaalum
paththaadhadi.

Rojapu dhegaththaal
raja naan saanjitten
un munne en geththu
nikkaadhadi.

am a loyal husband
given u a  royal treatment
and your daily shoppn
is grauntee.

your're my meesai maama
am your naughty maami
giving yo a life time 
service waranty.
